description: A with right leg only partially formed, possibly with pitchfork foot on right

features.description: Is the top rounded? 0 = round, 1 = angled
How many prongs does the pitchfork have? 0 = no prongs, 1,2,... = 1,2,... prongs
Is the A missing its crossbar? 0 = no, 1 = yes, 2 = indeterminate
Is there a connecting line for the pitchfork tines? 0 = no, 1 = yes, 2 = indeterminate
Is the pitchfork oriented perpendicular to the A leg? 0 = no, 1 = yes, 2 = yes and facing the A, 3 = indeterminate
